sentence: Moreover, and possibly the most onerous consequence, if market participants were to lose confidence, many countries, including the United States, may be faced with unusual liquidity demands.
Much of this delay could be attributed to resource demands and the lack of a sufficient knowledge base on Year 2000 issues.
Finally, we should all recognize that most systems are built to withstand reasonable service demands.
I am cautiously optimistic that the United States and the global economy will weather the century date change without major disruptions to economic activity.
